mapper.update: update Boards set board_viewCnt = board_viewCnt + #{amount} where board_no = #{no}
mapper.insert: insert into Boards(member_id, board_title, board_category, board_content) values(#{member_id}, #{board_title}, 'notice', #{board_content})

mapper.select: select board_no from ReplyBoards where replyBoard_no = #{replyBoard_no}
